text: is a Japanese football player for Giravanz Kitakyushu on loan from Montedio Yamagata. ==Career== After attending University of Tsukuba, Kitagawa joined Montedio Yamagata in January 2018.https://headlines.yahoo.co.jp/hl?a=20180115-00000003-sph-socc ==Club statistics== Updated to end of 2018 season.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 197 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
